entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:03 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
